recipesJson.name: My Graham Craker
recipesJson.author: tim7423
recipesJson.description:
Trying to make my own graham cracker from scratch. This is totally a base. Can probably bend this with other cookies, biscuits, cakes. I think this would pair up with a hint of any of the following.

meringue 
cinnamon
vanilla
coconut
frosting/Icing
